documents.document: Can finally watch MOTD again after months in the footballing wilderness...more of the same on Saturday please #CPFC
La La Land was La La Lovely but dare I say it, a little overhyped?!
And that's a wrap! An amazing time in a fantastic city... #OMAMumbai https://t.co/4pLcWxllpL
The only way to see the city #OMAMumbai https://t.co/uvn3h6xF53
@eugehop10 cnt argue wiv dat tbf https://t.co/sR1pzenx3y
@hywelpeterson top night H, thanks for having us!
@DExpress_Sport but #cpfc have already loaned Remy from Chelsea? I was under the impression you could only loan one player from a club?
@eugehop10 ummmmm do I hav 2 watch it or can I hv my handz ova my eyez?
@onlytimaloud @BBCRadioWales @wynneevans listening in...painting my spare room a shade of Goose Down...
@ReesAsh annoying but should've been 3-0 down by half time which is far more concerning!! Could be a long first half of 2017...
@C__Thorne never thought I'd advocate Campbell coming on for Benteke!!
A truly abject first half spent making Swansea look like Barcelona. Full backs dreadful, Zaha MIA and Benteke flicking it on to no one #cpfc
Has Wilf already gone to the AFCON? #cpfc
Big night for the Soccer Castles...go get those Sea Swans #cpfc
@eugehop10 kno u is prob wtchin already but grl on Masterminds chosen subject iz Disney films.
@CPFCHQ had we harried and hassled for 45 mins and ultimately tired fans would be a lot more understanding. The problem is we never did...
The concerning thing is we actually looked better when we took our 3 record signings off...need a lot more from our big names! #cpfc
In fairness to him, Campbell has done more harrying and chasing down in 15 mins than Benteke did all game...too many #cpfc players coasting!
Open season on Zaha...surely professional referees are coached not to ref on reputation #cpfc
...2nd half will be all about getting Zaha/Townsend one on one with Kaboul as much as possible! #bigsamsrednbluearmy #cpfc
Improved first half from #cpfc. Cabaye and Townsend much more prominent. If only Benteke had kicked the pen as hard as Gomes kicked him...
You get the impression Townsend wasn't too upset to see Pardew go #cpfc
@eugehop10 hi mate. any idea how I can get around fa regulations surrounding 3rd party ownership?
Would've been an impressive up and down @cpduke... https://t.co/JIZ9zgvoO7
Fair play, Congressional is in top nick given the weather we've had lately! Nice to get back into the swing of itâ€¦ https://t.co/2hVlwjCzSJ
Jon Moss also doing his best to kill any hint of the game starting to flow. Kante arguably luck to still be on the pitch #cpfc
Good first half from #cpfc undone again by a defensive lapse. Hennessey has to either make that his or stay in his goal, does neither, 1-0!
A clearer yellow card you will never see...Jon Moss at it again! #cpfc
@sjkelly07 @Wyn_Davies 2 can't argue with a goal like that!
Dear Alan, please explain subbing your best def mid for Frazier Campbell when Pogba has run the show all night? #cpfc #pardewed
Delaney to finish his career with a few years in the number 10 role #cpfc
With the players we have on the pitch there's no other option other than to play 4231. We look dangerous with Wilf running at the full backs
@Wyn_Davies @sjkelly07 not exactly a classic so far!! ðŸ’¤ðŸ’¤ðŸ’¤
Ibra catches it and throws it to an offside Pogba...other than that a pretty good goal! #cpfc
Zaha puts in one of the best all round performances of the season on the wing. Starts the next game up front #pardewed #cpfc
The FA has to get tough on diving. It seems retrospective action can be taken for everything bar what is one of the worst offences! #cpfc
@fflurwyn thanks Fflur! Hope you're well xx
@carys300192 @onlymenaloud @KomediaBath diolch Carys!x
@Maggiemagpet @onlymenaloud @KomediaBath thanks Maggie, glad you enjoyed and nice to see you all!x

@gertiemaud @onlymenaloud cheers Lis...hope alls well with you! Have a great Christmas!
@sjkelly07 @huweuron1 @TomHier_ @Wyn_Davies @CraigYates thanks Stuart, you too mate!

@FYPFanzine Carry On Conceding
@ddwt bonkers mate...be hard pushed to find two worse defences than were on show today...could be a long season for both of us!!
All this with the most expensive squad we've ever assembled...how can Pardew keep his job? #cpfc https://t.co/UK4sD2xouQ
@eugehop10 @Dan230622 you've only got 100?
@aledpwilliams mental mate, think it's taken years off me!!!!
@eugehop10 @Dan230622 I stand by my earlier statement
Good few #cpfc fans join in with 'sacked in the morning' chants...lost the fans, lost the team...Pardew has to go!
Bet Sigurdsson doesn't even get this much set piece practice in training ...so many needless fouls/corners #cpfc
@TheEaglesBeak its a hole that needs a left peg at least! Can't fault MK effort but surely time for Fryers or even Ledley to have a run?
@TheEaglesBeak play a left back at left back...controversial I know
Kelly needs a lot more help dealing with Barrow...can't fault his effort but we desperately miss a pacy left footer #cpfc
@TheBrizza @bubbagumpuk1 Palace v Sunderland 4th Feb? Romantic weekend for 2?
